languages.text: "Так теперь Лорд-капитан потакает культу смерти? Он{mf||а} же не будет резать кого ни попадя, потому что "Неумирающий даровал {mf|ему|ей} знак?"
"So, the Lord Captain is indulging the spinners now? Is {mf|he|she} going to start cutting people left and right because 'the Undying One gave {mf|him|her} a sign'?"
languages.original_text: "Так теперь Лорд-капитан потакает культу смерти? Он{mf||а} же не будет резать кого ни попадя, потому что "Неумирающий даровал {mf|ему|ей} знак?"

traits.locale_text: "So, the Lord Captain is an honorary death cultist now? {mf|He|She}'s not going to start cutting people left and right because 'the Undying One gave {mf|him|her} a sign,' is {mf|he|she}?"
"So, the Lord Captain is an honorary death cultist now? {mf|He|She}'s not going to start cutting people left and right because 'the Undying One gave {mf|him|her} a sign,' is {mf|he|she}?"
"So, the Lord Captain is a spinner now too? Is {mf|he|she} going to start cutting people left and right because 'the Undying One gave {mf|him|her} a sign'?"
"So, the Lord Captain is a spinner now too? Is {mf|he|she} going to start cutting people left and right because 'the Undying One gave {mf|him|her} a sign'?"
"So, the Lord Captain is a spinner now too? Is {mf|he|she} going to start cutting people left and right because 'the Undying One gave {mf|him|her} a sign'?"
"So, the Lord Captain is indulging the spinners now? Is {mf|he|she} going to start cutting people left and right because 'the Undying One gave {mf|him|her} a sign'?"
"So, the Lord Captain is indulging the spinners now? Is {mf|he|she} going to start cutting people left and right because 'the Undying One gave {mf|him|her} a sign'?"

languages.text: "Der Lord Captain ist also auch {mf|ein Spinner|eine Spinnerin}? Wird {mf|er|sie} bald anfangen, reihenweise Leute aufzuschneiden, weil 'der Todlose {mf|ihm|ihr} ein Zeichen gegeben hat'?"
languages.original_text: "So, the Lord Captain is indulging the spinners now? Is {mf|he|she} going to start cutting people left and right because 'the Undying One gave {mf|him|her} a sign'?"

traits.locale_text: "Der Lord Captain ist jetzt also auch {mf|ein Netzspinner|eine Netzspinnerin}? Wird {mf|er|sie} bald anfangen, reihenweise Leute aufzuschneiden, weil 'der Todlose {mf|ihm|ihr} ein Zeichen gegeben hat'?"

languages.text: « Or donc, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} se plie aux désidératas des tisseurs ? Vous croyez qu'{mf|il|elle} va se mettre à trucider des innocents à tour de bras sous prétexte que l'Immortel lui a envoyé un signe ? »
languages.original_text: "So, the Lord Captain is indulging the spinners now? Is {mf|he|she} going to start cutting people left and right because 'the Undying One gave {mf|him|her} a sign'?"

traits.locale_text: « Or donc, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} a rejoint les rangs des tisseurs ? Vous croyez qu'{mf|il|elle} va se mettre à trucider des innocents à tour de bras sous prétexte que l'Immortel lui a envoyé un signe ? »

languages.text: «De modo que {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán ahora es amig{mf|o|a} de los tejedores. ¿También va a ir por ahí troceando a la gente porque "ha recibido una señal del Inmortal"?».
languages.original_text: "So, the Lord Captain is indulging the spinners now? Is {mf|he|she} going to start cutting people left and right because 'the Undying One gave {mf|him|her} a sign'?"

traits.locale_text: «Así que {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán ahora también es tejedor{mf||a}. ¿También va a ir por ahí troceando a la gente porque "ha recibido una señal del Inmortal"?».

languages.text: 「それで、ロード・キャプテンは織り手を気ままにさせるということ？陛下は、不死の者が合図を送ったからという理由で、人を無差別に殺し始めるつもりなの？」
languages.original_text: "So, the Lord Captain is indulging the spinners now? Is {mf|he|she} going to start cutting people left and right because 'the Undying One gave {mf|him|her} a sign'?"

traits.locale_text: 「つまりロード・キャプテンも今やスピナーということ？{mf|彼|彼女}｝は、不死の者がサインを与えたという理由で、人を無差別に殺し始めるつもりなの？」

languages.text: “也就是说，舰长大人也打算放任那些织网者胡来？{mf|他|她}会不会也因为‘看到了不死之神的预示’，就开始到处乱砍人？”
languages.original_text: "So, the Lord Captain is indulging the spinners now? Is {mf|he|she} going to start cutting people left and right because 'the Undying One gave {mf|him|her} a sign'?"

traits.locale_text: “也就是说，舰长大人也变成织网者了？{mf|他|她}会不会因为‘看到了不死之神的预示’，就开始到处乱砍人？”

languages.original_text: "So, the Lord Captain is indulging the spinners now? Is {mf|he|she} going to start cutting people left and right because 'the Undying One gave {mf|him|her} a sign'?"

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, şimdi de dokurları mı şımartıyor? 'Ölmeyen ona bir işaret gösterdi' diye önüne gelen insanları kesip biçmeye mi başlayacak?"
languages.original_text: "So, the Lord Captain is indulging the spinners now? Is {mf|he|she} going to start cutting people left and right because 'the Undying One gave {mf|him|her} a sign'?"
